item.title: Home
item.description: Welcome! My name is Robin Candau, also known as Antiz on the internet, I’m 27. I’m a french Linux system engineer passionate by skate, music, craft (beers) and, obviously, Linux! This website serves as a central place to get general/contact info about me, as well as writing some blog posts when I feel like it. Projects I contribute to many Open Source projects and I’m always willing to help and learn in the process!
